author: bgstack15
long_description:
list_to_file lists the currently signed-in users to a file, which can be processed by external tools for reporting purposes.

list_to_file writes to `<worldpath>/active-players.txt` the names of the users who are currently logged in. It does this in multiple ways listed below.

* Automatically every so many seconds, based on setting `listing_seconds`. Disabled if set to 0.
* command `/list_to_file` which is available to users with privilege `server`.

This mod was written by bgstack15
*willing to use translation features; get in touch*
name: list_to_file
short_description: List currently signed-in players to worldpath/active-players.txt
title: list_to_file
